Documentation¶

class reamber.osu.OsuBpmObj.OsuBpmObj(offset: float = 0.0, bpm: ‘float’ = 120.0, metronome: ‘int’ = 4, sampleSet: int = 0, sampleSetIndex: int = 0, volume: int = 50, kiai: bool = False)¶

Bases: reamber.osu.OsuTimingPointMeta.OsuTimingPointMeta, reamber.base.BpmObj.BpmObj

static codeToValue(code: float) → float¶

Converts the data in the .osu file to the actual Bpm Value

static readString(s: str) → reamber.osu.OsuBpmObj.OsuBpmObj¶

Reads a single line under the [TimingPoints] Label. This must explicitly be a BPM Point.

static valueToCode(value: float) → float¶

Converts the actual Bpm Value to a writable float in .osu

writeString() → str¶

Exports a .osu writable string
